page.title: 19TRANSPORT AROUND HOCKWOLD
page.content: Transport-wise,compared with many rural areas,this village is well served.{Eastern Counties bus}company operates daily to Thetford with connections to Bury St. Edmunds,and on market days to Newmarket and Ely. A { {private bus}company runs to towns on respective market days.There are no scheduled bus or train services after 6.30 pm.{Contract}buses convey children to senior schools and industrial employees to their places of work.2{taxi}firms operate to the mile distant railway station & to 3 local air bases.1981 Census showed 88 families had no car,209 had 1 car,85 had 2 cars & 25 had 3 or more.{Car- {sharing}to work takes place.A high percentage of residents shop outside the village.A few adults own motor- cycles.Most children own bicycles.
